title: Free to enter tournament - April 16

embed.description: Razer Arena makes organizing and competing in your own tournaments easier than ever. Complete with features that allow for easy match creation, automatic reporting of results, scheduled match notifications, fair competitive play. Arena is truly the best way to take your passion for gaming up a notch.

body:
Hey all!

Spots are filling fast in the AGGN Open LoL Tournament on April 16th. It's tournament open to all skill levels, with some AWESOME prizes up for grabs. 

With a free to enter online tournament, there is no reason not to put together a team and and sign up while there are still spots left! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask!

All players/teams must sign up on: https://arena.razerzone.com/tournaments/details/2304/aggn-open-lol-tournament

To be eligible for Riot provided prizes, all players must sign up on: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/184632
